quote: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow.
name: Edward Teller

quote: Technology is a useful servant but a dangerous master.
name: Christian Lous Lange

quote: Every once in a while, a new technology, an old problem, and a big idea turn into an innovation.
name: Dean Kamen

quote: New technology is not good or evil in and of itself. It's all about how people choose to use it.
name: David Wong

quote: Technology is, of course, a double edged sword. Fire can cook our food but also burn us.
name: Jason Silva

quote: Getting information off the Internet is like taking a drink from a fire hydrant.
name: Mitch Kapor

quote: Sharing is good, and with digital technology, sharing is easy.
name: Richard Stallman

quote: Social media is not about the exploitation of technology but service to community.
name: Simon Mainwaring

quote: Technology, like art, is a soaring exercise of the human imagination.
name: Daniel Bell

quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
name: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: Science and technology revolutionize our lives, but memory, tradition and myth frame our response.
name: Arthur M. Schlesinger

quote: Men have become the tools of their tools.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Information technology is at the core of how you do your business and how your business model itself evolves.
name: Satya Nadella

quote: The real problem is not whether machines think but whether men do.
name: B. F. Skinner

quote: Everybody gets so much information all day long that they lose their common sense.
name: Gertrude Stein

quote: The further you get into technology, the further you go into gaming. That's the general rule.
name: Nick Johnson

quote: Technological progress has merely provided us with more efficient means for going backwards.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: It's not a faith in technology. It's faith in people.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: The digital camera is a great invention because it allows us to reminisce. Instantly.
name: Demetri Martin

quote: Television is a medium because anything well done is rare.
name: Fred Allen

quote: Good, bad or indifferent, if you are not investing in new technology, you are going to be left behind.
name: Philip Green

quote: It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.
name: Unknown

quote: The Internet is so big, so powerful and pointless that for some people it is a complete substitute for life.
name: Andrew Brown

quote: Technology and robotics are advancing and will reduce the need for workers in the future.
name: Jan C. Ting

quote: The purpose of technology is not to confuse the brain but to serve the body.
name: William S. Burroughs

quote: We can't blame the technology when we make mistakes.
name: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: As information technology restructures the work situation, it abstracts thought from action.
name: Shoshana Zuboff

quote: Technology and social media have brought power back to the people.
name: Mark McKinnon

quote: I think technology really increased human ability. But technology cannot produce compassion.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: Healthcare is becoming part of information technology.
name: Bill Maris

quote: Art challenges technology, but technology inspires the art.
name: John Lasseter

quote: The only constant in the technology industry is change.
name: Marc Benioff

quote: Our world is built on biology and once we begin to understand it, it then becomes a technology.
name: Ryan Bethencourt

quote: While technology is important, it's what we do with it that truly matters.
name: Muhammad Yunus

quote: The new electronic independence re-creates the world in the image of a global village.
name: Marshall McLuhan

quote: Technology is so much fun but we can drown in our technology. The fog of information can drive out knowledge.
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: True flexibility is a symbiotic partnership between employer and employee and between technology and culture.
name: Jean-Philippe Courtois

quote: One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: It is impossible to work in information technology without also engaging in social engineering.
name: Jaron Lanier

quote: Even when you take a holiday from technology, technology doesn't take a break from you.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: Once a new technology rolls over you, if you're not part of the steamroller, you're part of the road.
name: Stewart Brand

quote: You affect the world by what you browse.
name: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: Growing up, I wish that I'd had the supplies and laptops and all the new technology that's out right now.
name: James Harden

quote: Bill Gates is a very rich man today... and do you want to know why? The answer is one word: versions.
name: Dave Barry

quote: People who are really serious about software should make their own hardware.
name: Alan Kay

quote: The internet is a great way to get on the net.
name: Bob Dole

quote: Cyberspace can't compensate for real space. We benefit from chatting to people face to face.
name: Jonathan Sacks

quote: It is the framework which changes with each new technology and not just the picture within the frame.
name: Marshall McLuhan

quote: I just invent, then wait until man comes around to needing what I've invented.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: The Linux philosophy is 'Laugh in the face of danger'. Oops. Wrong One. 'Do it yourself'. Yes, that's it.
name: Linus Torvalds

quote: Hackers rarely have full knowledge of the technology stack of a target.
name: John McAfee

quote: Magic and new technology have always walked hand in hand - even back in the days of Robert Houdin.
name: David Copperfield

quote: Technology makes the world a new place.
name: Shoshana Zuboff

quote: A satellite has no conscience.
name: Edward R. Murrow

quote: Our philosophy is, using internet technology, we can make every company become Amazon.
name: Jack Ma

quote: Taking new technology and incorporating into how people work and live is not easy.
name: Oren Etzioni

quote: The Internet treats censorship as a malfunction and routes around it.
name: John Perry Barlow

quote: Technology is cool, but you've got to use it as opposed to letting it use you.
name: Prince

quote: To master a new technology, you have to play with it.
name: Jordan Peterson

quote: We've arranged a civilization in which most crucial elements profoundly depend on science and technology.
name: Carl Sagan

quote: If science fiction is the mythology of modern technology, then its myth is tragic.
name: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: Our business is about technology, yes. But it's also about operations and customer relationships.
name: Michael Dell

quote: Technology is unlocking the innate compassion we have for our fellow human beings.
name: Bill Gates

quote: Microsoft isn't evil, they just make really crappy operating systems.
name: Linus Torvalds

quote: The Web as I envisaged it, we have not seen it yet. The future is still so much bigger than the past.
name: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: I'm not a tech guy. I'm looking at the technology with the eyes of my customers, normal people's eyes.
name: Jack Ma

quote: If it keeps up, man will atrophy all his limbs but the push-button finger.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Every aspect of human technology has a dark side, including the bow and arrow.
name: Margaret Atwood

quote: The final frontier of the digital technology is integrating into your own brain.
name: Ramez Naam

quote: Stone Age. Bronze Age. Iron Age. We define entire epics of humanity by the technology they use.
name: Reed Hastings

quote: If we marry educational technology with quality, enriching content, that's a circle of win.
name: LeVar Burton

quote: We are led by lawyers who do not understand either technology or balance sheets.
name: Thomas Friedman

quote: Our approach to making games is to find the fun first and then use the technology to enhance the fun.
name: Sid Meier

quote: A world technology means either a world government or world suicide.
name: Max Lerner

quote: Technology doesn't address everything - for example, air travel still sucks.
name: Brad Feld

quote: Banking technology has made it simple and efficient to invest in good causes.
name: Mark Skousen

quote: I believe in the power of shared data and technology to help build a better future.
name: Paul Allen

quote: I just am a huge cheerleader for getting kids interested in science and technology.
name: Vint Cerf

quote: Technology does not run backward. Once a technical capability is out there, it is out there for good.
name: Ellen Ullman

quote: Every technology, including the printing press, comes at some price.
name: Bill Keller

quote: Technology feeds on itself. Technology makes more technology possible.
name: Alvin Toffler

quote: The combination of hatred and technology is the greatest danger threatening mankind.
name: Simon Wiesenthal

quote: I love to use technology to help people have better lives and to reduce our impact on the planet.
name: Megan Smith

quote: Humanity is acquiring all the right technology for all the wrong reasons.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Technology, through automation and artificial intelligence, is definitely one of the most disruptive sources.
name: Alain Dehaze

quote: Our technological powers increase, but the side effects and potential hazards also escalate.
name: Alvin Toffler

quote: I've always wanted to own and control the primary technology in everything we do.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: Study hard so that you can master technology, which allows us to master nature.
name: Che Guevara

quote: The intersection of law, politics, and technology is going to force a lot of good thinking.
name: Bill Gates

quote: Universal coverage, not medical technology, is the foundation of any caring health care system.
name: Richard Lamm

quote: Relying on the government to protect your privacy is like asking a peeping tom to install your window blinds.
name: John Perry Barlow

quote: There is a difference between what technology enables and what historical business practices enable.
name: Bill Gates

quote: Globalization was a deep trend pushed by technology and right ideas, as much as anything else.
name: Jeffrey Sachs

quote: We cannot turn back the clock. We cannot undo the impact of technology. Nor would we want to.
name: Robert Mueller

quote: Technology is only meaningful when it reaches the people.
name: Pranav Mistry

quote: Technology just means information technology.
name: Peter Thiel

quote: With any advent in technology, any technological innovation, there is the good and the bad.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: The age of innocent faith in science and technology may be over.
name: Barry Commoner

quote: Any new technology tends to go through a 25-year adoption cycle.
name: Marc Andreessen

quote: Healthcare is the only civil system where new technology makes prices go up instead of down.
name: Jaan Tallinn

quote: Silicon Valley has some of the smartest engineers and technology business people in the world.
name: Elon Musk

quote: We must ensure that technology is accessible, affordable, and adds value.
name: Narendra Modi

quote: All of our technology is completely unnecessary to a happy life.
name: Tom Hodgkinson

quote: Creative people are notoriously the slowest to adopt new technology.
name: Robert Rodriguez

quote: For a successful technology, reality must take precedence over public relations, for Nature cannot be fooled.
name: Richard P. Feynman

quote: The machine does not isolate man from the great problems of nature but plunges him more deeply into them.
name: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: The latest technology is not always good for anything except to the producers of the technology.
name: Wendell Berry

quote: The key to making things affordable is design and technology improvements, as well as scale.
name: Elon Musk

quote: Social media is great, I guess, but it feels like technology is the sapper of innocence.
name: Chris O'Dowd

quote: Especially in technology, we need revolutionary change, not incremental change.
name: Larry Page

quote: With technology tracking us everywhere we go, 'cosplay' might become our best defense against surveillance.
name: Annalee Newitz

quote: What new technology does is create new opportunities to do a job that customers want done.
name: Tim O'Reilly

quote: I predict that technology will enable people to transmit their neuronal, actual feelings over the Internet.
name: Michio Kaku

quote: World War II had a very important impact on the development of technology, as a whole.
name: Barry Commoner

quote: If you run from technology, it will chase you.
name: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: You don't have to be young to learn about technology. You have to feel young.
name: Vint Cerf

quote: Technology and industry have distanced people from nature and magic and human values.
name: Laura Esquivel

quote: Many of our advances in science and technology were seeded through government.
name: Valerie Jarrett

quote: Technology requires knowledge and expertise more than it requires money.
name: Jonathan Raymond

quote: One of the biggest challenges to medicine is the incorporation of information technology in our practices.
name: Samuel Wilson

quote: Technology will eventually destroy the way schools are run now.
name: Daniel Greenberg

quote: As technology has improved, our digital lives have only grown more tangled and cluttered.
name: Ryan Holmes

quote: If you're not looking toward the future or trying to improve the current technology, you'll be left behind.
name: Gwynne Shotwell

quote: If the human race wants to go to hell in a basket, technology can help it get there by jet.
name: Charles Mengel Allen

quote: Wherever technology reaches its real fulfillment, it transcends into architecture.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: What the country needs are a few labor-making inventions.
name: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Mechanization best serves mediocrity.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: I think there are going to be a bunch of tablet-like devices. It's really a different product category.
name: Jeff Bezos

quote: The film industry brings people together, and so does technology. I see them as similar platforms.
name: Ashton Kutcher

quote: The great growling engine of change - technology.
name: Alvin Toffler

quote: All of technology, really, is about maximizing free options.
name: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quote: There is no technology today that cannot be defeated by social engineering.
name: Frank Abagnale

quote: I love technology - yes, I have fallen in love with older cars, but I'm all for new technology.
name: Mario Andretti

quote: If that's there, I believe that technology will probably step up to their part of it.
name: Neil Armstrong

quote: I know what I don't know. To this day, I don't know technology, and I don't know finance or accounting.
name: Bernard Ebbers

quote: In software systems it is often the early bird that makes the worm.
name: Alan Perlis

quote: Technology has become as ubiquitous as the air we breathe, so we are no longer conscious of its presence.
name: Godfrey Reggio

quote: Advances in technology and the Internet have dramatically changed the way we communicate, live, and work.
name: Suzan DelBene

quote: We're still in the first minutes of the first day of the Internet revolution.
name: Scott Cook

quote: We're a very iterative company, so we jump on basically all new technology.
name: Parker Harris

quote: First, I do not think there is any silver bullet to solving the technology side of the security equation.
name: John W. Thompson

quote: For me, modern technology has ruined romance and movies - nobody can run to the airplane gate anymore.
name: Lorene Scafaria

quote: Like all tools, modern technology has produced some wonderful moments in music and also some horrors.
name: Hugh Hopper

quote: People use technology only to mean digital technology. Technology is actually everything we make.
name: Margaret Atwood

quote: I've always felt that technology can be used to our benefit and should be used to our benefit.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: People are stunned to hear that one company has data files on 185 million Americans.
name: Ralph Nader

quote: Our lifetime may be the last that will be lived out in a technological society.
name: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: The human condition today is better than it's ever been, and technology is one of the reasons for that.
name: Tom Clancy

quote: I love technology. We can be our own DJs wherever we go.
name: Ludacris

quote: The minimum we should hope for with any display technology is that it should do no harm.
name: Edward Tufte

quote: I love this stuff - bitcoin, ethereum, blockchain technology - and what the future holds.
name: Abigail Johnson

quote: I think technology can change every country regardless of political party.
name: John T. Chambers

quote: And what is religion, you might ask. It's a technology of living.
name: Toni Cade Bambara

quote: The future of innovation has to include not only the technology, but economic viability.
name: Dennis Muilenburg

quote: Doing linear scans over an associative array is like trying to club someone to death with a loaded Uzi.
name: Larry Wall

quote: Technology is the foundation of the empowerment economy.
name: Elise Stefanik

quote: For infrastructure technology, C will be hard to displace.
name: Dennis Ritchie

quote: The coming changes in technology will be as profound as the creation of the Internet.
name: Rajeev Suri

quote: Many people mistakenly think a new technology cancels out an old one.
name: Judith Martin

quote: Technology has always been destroying jobs, and it has always been creating jobs.
name: Erik Brynjolfsson

quote: Technology is neutral, but it all depends on the way we use it.
name: Jean-Michel Jarre

quote: I've always been interested in gadgets and technology and I've always been a reader.
name: LeVar Burton

quote: It's not that we use technology, we live technology.
name: Godfrey Reggio

quote: AI might be a powerful technology, but things won't get better simply by adding AI.
name: Vivienne Ming

quote: Doing exercise without monitoring yourself will be rare in the future of wearable technology.
name: Astro Teller

quote: I am interested in computers and technology, and art, photography, and design.
name: William Landay

quote: In a world of global competition and new technology, I think competition is coming from new places.
name: Charles L. Evans

quote: My theme for philanthropy is the same approach I used with technology: to find a need and fill it.
name: An Wang

quote: I know nothing about technology.
name: Jack Ma

quote: Tweeting is like sending out cool telegrams to your friends once a week.
name: Tom Hanks

quote: The multiplication force of technology on cognitive differences is massive.
name: Jordan Peterson

quote: Science, as opposed to technology, does violence to common sense.
name: Richard Dawkins

quote: Technology is making gestures precise and brutal, and with them men.
name: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: Technology is a wonderful thing, but I think it's violently misused.
name: Iris Apfel

quote: Apple has long been a leading innovator of mobile technology; I myself own an iPhone.
name: Al Franken

quote: Technology is always a two-edged sword. It will bring in many benefits, but also many disasters.
name: Alan Moore

quote: Businesses and users are going to use technology only if they can trust it.
name: Satya Nadella

quote: The underlying principles of strategy are enduring, regardless of technology or the pace of change.
name: Michael Porter

quote: Product management really is the fusion between technology, what engineers do - and the business side.
name: Marissa Mayer

quote: Technology itself is neither good nor bad. People are good or bad.
name: Naveen Jain

quote: If information wants to be free, then that's true everywhere, not just in information technology.
name: Mitch Kapor

quote: I believe that people are too complacent about technology.
name: Peter Thiel

quote: You can't really imagine music without technology.
name: Brian Eno

quote: There are better alternatives... Australia should be exporting its solar technology, not its uranium.
name: Bob Brown

quote: We will leverage technology to collaborate with the government in its e-governance initiatives.
name: Chanda Kochhar

quote: Our industry has invested so much money in technology that perhaps it's time to invest in talent, in people.
name: Christiane Amanpour

quote: Technology is not good, it's neutral.
name: Tom Shadyac

quote: Many people recognize that technology often comes with unintended and undesirable side effects.
name: Leon Kass

quote: Real programmers can write assembly code in any language.
name: Larry Wall

quote: With advances in technology come new in-demand career paths.
name: Tae Yoo

quote: I don't understand technology, and I'm very scared of it.
name: Adam Driver

quote: I hate to mention age, but I come from an era when we weren't consumed by technology and television.
name: Jimmy Buffett

quote: To make a rock'n'roll record, technology is the least important thing.
name: Keith Richards

quote: Humanity is smart. Sometime in the technology world we think we are smarter, but we are not smarter than you.
name: Mitchell Baker

quote: With technology now, you can go in and sing a song, and for $100,000, you will sound flawless.
name: Vince Neil

quote: It is a free world. It is a dynamic of our new day and age: technology is everywhere.
name: Oscar Munoz

quote: I don't know technology and engineering. I don't know accounting.
name: Bernard Ebbers

quote: I would like to see the technology used to explore more period horror genre works, for example, E. A. Poe.
name: Robert Englund

quote: Technology does not always rhyme with perfection and reliability. Far from it in reality!
name: Jean-Michel Jarre

quote: Society will decide after the technology is created what we will and won't accept.
name: Jesse Eisenberg

quote: You can't think of technology as separate from all of our human drama anymore.
name: Robin Sloan

quote: As technology progresses, I believe that fintech will fundamentally change finance.
name: Taavet Hinrikus

quote: We want to be on the edge of technology all of the time. We think long-term.
name: Hans Vestberg

quote: Well, another market is being created now out of Internet technology.
name: Jim Barksdale

quote: My dad was an inventor, and I think I've always had a rosy view of technology, or at least its potential.
name: Scott McCloud

quote: The biotechnology wave is similar to the information technology wave of the 1980s and 1990s.
name: Dietmar Hopp

quote: Movie-making is telling a story with the best technology at your disposal.
name: Tom Hanks

quote: Television has changed the American child from an irresistable force to an immovable object.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: One of the major problems with China is that its innovation is largely borrowed technology.
name: Alan Greenspan

quote: Technology is anything that wasn't around when you were born.
name: Alan Kay

quote: YouTube is akin to having my own network.
name: Marlee Matlin

quote: The 'Net is a waste of time, and that's exactly what's right about it.
name: William Gibson

quote: Sites need to be able to interact in one single, universal space.
name: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: For the most part, any serious magic show is not using very much technology newer than theatrical lights.
name: Penn Jillette

quote: Technology is changing the way we interact as humans.
name: Dan Brown

quote: Adding sound to movies would be like putting lipstick on the Venus de Milo.
name: Mary Pickford

quote: Once upon a time, sound was new technology.
name: Peter Jackson

quote: Technology has to be invented or adopted.
name: Jared Diamond

quote: The Internet is a telephone system that's gotten uppity.
name: Clifford Stoll

quote: When I think about developing solutions, I think about how we can use technology to make a difference.
name: John T. Chambers

quote: It is only when they go wrong that machines remind you how powerful they are.
name: Clive James

quote: Technology is the knack of so arranging the world that we don't have to experience it.
name: Max Frisch

quote: Technology changes all the time; human nature, hardly ever.
name: Evgeny Morozov

quote: Microsoft is engaging in unlawful predatory practices that go well beyond the scope of fair competition.
name: Orrin Hatch

quote: People try to treat technology as an object, and it can't be. It can only be a channel.
name: Jaron Lanier

quote: Defect-free software does not exist.
name: Wietse Venema

quote: Do you realize if it weren't for Edison we'd be watching TV by candlelight?
name: Al Boliska
